statements: DELETE FROM processing_capacities WHERE facility_id = 1 AND plastic_type = 'PET';
DELETE FROM processing_capacities WHERE capacity > 1000 AND plastic_type = 'PET';
DELETE FROM plastic_recycling_facilities WHERE location = 'California' AND capacity < 5000;
